title: Go Bang – PNAU
brief_description: Australian dance act PNAU are celebrated for groundbreaking visuals in their live act and music videos, including for their single Go Bang (2017) which featured Kira Divine. The clip creates a psychedelic, cosmic journey through animation, the glow-in-the-dark effects and an aquatic aesthetic.

constellations_primary.name: Go Bang
constellations_primary.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

description: Australian dance act PNAU are celebrated for groundbreaking visuals in their live act and music videos, including for their single ‘Go Bang’, which featured Kira Divine. Setting out to create a psychedelic, cosmic journey through the use of animation, the glow-in-the-dark effects and aquatic aesthetic conjure images of James Cameron’s Avatar and the introduction of singing crab Tamatoa in Disney’s Moana.
description_for_label: Australian dance act PNAU are celebrated for groundbreaking visuals in their live act and music videos, including for their single ‘Go Bang’, which featured Kira Divine. Setting out to create a psychedelic, cosmic journey through the use of animation, the glow-in-the-dark effects and aquatic aesthetic conjure images of James Cameron’s Avatar and the introduction of singing crab Tamatoa in Disney’s Moana.
